definition[0]: someone, especially a man, who you think is unpleasant. Do not use this word
definition[1]: a man who you think is very lucky or very unlucky – often used humorously
example[1]: He’s gone straight to the top, the lucky bastard.
example[2]: The poor bastard fell off his horse.
definition[2]: something that causes difficulties or problems
definition[3]: someone who was born to parents who were not married
